test.name: TC10: Check links to expertise domains

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Scroll Down
kw.doc: This keyword scrolls down the page.

kw.name: Execute Javascript
kw.doc: Executes the given JavaScript code with possible arguments.
kw.msg: Executing JavaScript: window.scrollBy(0, 1000) Without any arguments.

kw.name: Click Lean More Button For Application Software
kw.doc: Clicks the "Lean more" button for the Application Software domain.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.arg: xpath=//section[@class='elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-58cac98 elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default parallax_section_no qode_elementor_container_no']//div[@class='elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default']
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Location Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current URL is exactly ``url``.

kw.name: Click Avisto Logo
kw.doc: This keyword clicks on the Avisto logo and verifies that the homepage is opened. It checks that after clicking the logo, the browser navigates back to the homepage URL https://www.avisto-eastern.com/.

kw.name: Click Image
kw.doc: Clicks an image identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.
kw.msg: Page title is 'Home < Avisto Eastern Europe'.

kw.name: Location Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current URL is exactly ``url``.

kw.name: Scroll Down
kw.doc: This keyword scrolls down the page.

kw.name: Execute Javascript
kw.doc: Executes the given JavaScript code with possible arguments.
kw.msg: Executing JavaScript: window.scrollBy(0, 1000) Without any arguments.

kw.msg: Element 'xpath=//a[@href='https://www.avisto-eastern.com/expertise/industrial-automation/']//span[@class='elementor-button-content-wrapper']//span[@class='elementor-button-text'][normalize-space()='Learn More']' not visible after 5 seconds.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Location Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current URL is exactly ``url``.

kw.name: Click Avisto Logo
kw.doc: This keyword clicks on the Avisto logo and verifies that the homepage is opened. It checks that after clicking the logo, the browser navigates back to the homepage URL https://www.avisto-eastern.com/.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.doc: This test case verifies that clicking on the "Lean more" buttons for different expertise domains navigates to the correct pages and clicking the Avisto logo returns to the main homepage.
test.status: Element 'xpath=//a[@href='https://www.avisto-eastern.com/expertise/industrial-automation/']//span[@class='elementor-button-content-wrapper']//span[@class='elementor-button-text'][normalize-space()='Learn More']' not visible after 5 seconds.
